## State.toStrings() method

Returns an array of all the string leaf state node paths.

**Signature:**

```typescript
toStrings(stateValue?: StateValue): string[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  stateValue | [StateValue](./xstate.statevalue.md) | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

string\[\]
